The Red Sox are struggling, going 3-7 in their last ten, with a disappointing.199 batting average and a 3.24 ERA.

The Red Sox feature Ceddanne Rafaela, with a powerful lineup that includes Jarren Duran, who has also been hot lately.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is set to begin at 7:10 p.m. EDT on Monday night.
The Mets are currently third in the NL East, while the Red Sox sit third in the AL East.
This matchup marks the first time these teams will face each other this season.
Historically, the Mets have had the advantage against the Red Sox in recent matchups, but with both teams fighting for playoff positioning, anything can happen.
The Mets' lineup performs well against right-handed pitchers, enhancing Alonso's chances of capitalizing on any mistakes made by Bello.
The Mets' bullpen has been mostly reliable this season, with depth that allows them to manage leads effectively.
The Red Sox bullpen has shown inconsistency, which could be a decisive factor in this matchup.
The New York Mets have been able to leverage a potent offense and effective pitching to maintain their position in the playoff hunt.
The Boston Red Sox have struggled with consistency, particularly in their recent games.
Others: Pete Alonso has been a crucial player for the Mets this season, with a batting average of.254, 30 home runs, and 80 RBIs.
Alonso has shown remarkable power and consistency at the plate, making him a key player to watch in this matchup.
Alonso has been hitting well, notching several multi-hit games and consistently reaching base.
His ability to drive in runs is evidenced by his impressive RBI total, and he remains a potent threat to hit home runs, especially against pitchers with high WHIP ratios.
Brayan Bello will take the mound for the Red Sox, with a 12-6 record, a 4.66 ERA, and a 1.37 WHIP.
Bello's performance has been shaky at times, making him vulnerable to powerful hitters like Alonso.
The Mets will start Luis Severino, who has a 9-6 record, a 3.96 ERA, and a 1.26 WHIP.
Severino has been effective in limiting runs and has shown the ability to strike out batters, making him a formidable opponent.
